title: Operational AI agent
summary: Use AI to summarize system health, detect anomalies, and answer operational questions using telemetry and audit events.

decisionGuidance.problemSolved: SLA breach alerts are late; ops needs earlier signals and faster diagnosis.
whenNotToUse: You lack telemetry or cannot safely index logs/events

thingsToWatchOutFor.opinionatedGuidance: Use AI to augment operators: detect, summarize, suggest next steps; keep humans in control.

complexity.rationale: Requires solid telemetry and disciplined guardrails.
complexity.skillDemand: SRE + AI ops design + security awareness.

realWorldExample.approach: Indexed audit events and enabled Teams queries for failures and message location.
